title: Bonus Episode: America’s Crush On Pedophile Teachers 09.25.17
itunes:title: Bonus Episode: America’s Crush On Pedophile Teachers 09.25.17
description:
In this bonus episode Jack & Miles have on one of the shows writers Alison Zeidman to talk about how America sucks at preparedness, Trump firing NFL players, & more. Plus guest correspondent Taylor Ortega calls in to talk about pedophilia on TV.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
